nodes.text: The Okara Battle Droid Ax R2 was a model of three-legged battle droid produced by the Okara Droid Company at the Okara Droid Factory on the planet Balmorra. Equipped with arm-mounted blaster cannons, a number of them were used to defend the exterior of the factory during the Cold War between the Galactic Republic and the reconstituted Sith Empire.
Okara Battle Droid Ax R2s appear as enemies in the video game Star Wars: The Old Republic, where they can be found around the Okara Droid Factory on the Imperial version of Balmorra.
